mapper.select: SELECT b.BOARD_ID, b.BOARD_TITLE, b.BOARD_CONTENT, b.BOARD_REGISTER_DATE, b.BOARD_VIEWS , b.MEMBER_INDEX, m.MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM board b INNER JOIN member m ON b.MEMBER_INDEX = m.MEMBER_INDEX
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board( BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_REGISTER_DATE, BOARD_VIEWS, MEMBER_INDEX, BOARD_UPDATE_DATE) values(#{boardTitle}, #{boardContent},DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d'), 0, 2, now())
mapper.select: SELECT b.BOARD_UPDATE_DATE, b.BOARD_ID, b.BOARD_TITLE, b.BOARD_CONTENT, b.BOARD_REGISTER_DATE, b.BOARD_VIEWS , b.MEMBER_INDEX, m.MEMBER_NICKNAME, i.MEMBER_UPLOAD_IMAGE_PATH, i.MEMBER_UPLOAD_IMAGE_NAME FROM board b INNER JOIN member m ON b.MEMBER_INDEX = m.MEMBER_INDEX INNER JOIN MEMBER_UPLOAD_IMAGE i ON b.BOARD_ID = i.BOARD_ID WHERE b.BOARD_ID = #{boardId}
SELECT BOARD_ID FROM board order by BOARD_ID desc limit 1
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET BOARD_TITLE = #{boardTitle}, BOARD_CONTENT = #{boardContent}, BOARD_UPDATE_DATE = now(), BOARD_VIEWS = 0 WHERE BOARD_ID = #{boardId}
